meanings.definition: The outermost layer of a pollen grain.
meanings.sent1: The extine protects the pollen grain from harm.
meanings.sent2: Bees collect pollen grains, including the extine, to make honey.
meanings.sent3: The extine of the pollen grain was so strong, it acted like a shield.
meanings.sent4: The extine of the pollen grain was like armor, defending it from the elements.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the extine of the pollen grain looked like a tiny fortress.

meanings.definition: A tough outer layer of a spore.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the extine of spores to understand their durability.
meanings.sent2: The extine of the spore helps protect it during harsh conditions.
meanings.sent3: The extine of the spore was so tough, it could withstand extreme pressure.
meanings.sent4: The extine of the spore was like a shield, keeping the inner spore safe.
meanings.sent5: Even in the harshest environments, the extine of the spore remained intact.
